title: Immune Stim - Therapeutic Essential Oil Blend
author: Esther
cleaned_text: 10 ml A gently invigorating, pungent, fresh, green blend designed to support healthy immune functioning. The Immune Stim formula may be helpful with recurrent conditions of lowered immunity, as well as with conditions involving long-term fatigue and low stamina. Dominant oils: Niaouli, Cajeput, Hemlock spruce, Lavender, jojoba oil Chinese Medicine function: Tonifies the Qi and Yang, boosts the protective Qi and strengthens the Shen For external use only. Properly dilute all essential oils in lotion or vegetable carrier oil before massage or other topical use. Keep out of reach of children. If you are pregnant, nursing, have any health conditions, or are taking medications, please consult your healthcare provider before using essential oils. I've been very happy with the natural immune support of this oil blend. I have it going in the diffuser almost daily during the cold and flu season. It smells wonderful and feels like a wonderful boost. I use this blend to help build up my system with chemotherapy
